snippet: K.K.R. reported $225.5 million in adjusted fourth-quarter profit, down 68 percent from the period a year earlier, but the investment firm said the outlook for deals was improving.
abstract: K.K.R. reported $225.5 million in adjusted fourth-quarter profit, down 68 percent from the period a year earlier, but the investment firm said the outlook for deals was improving.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
